pipeline.name: forum_scraper_v2
pipeline.purpose: Collect Homey forum manufacturers (_TZ*, _TZE*) and productIds (TS****).

pipeline.name: deep_web_scraper_mini
pipeline.purpose: Aggregate minimal Zigbee sources (Z2M, Blakadder) for productIds/manufacturers.

pipeline.name: Data_Enricher
pipeline.purpose: Unify sources into normalized enrichment base (manufacturers, productIds, clusters, dps, batteries).

pipeline.name: Driver_Classifier_Corrector
pipeline.purpose: Apply enrichment, enforce mono-manufacturer per driver, normalize images/energy.

pipeline.name: sdk3_quick_autofix
pipeline.purpose: Auto-fix SDK3 rules: capabilities, classes, image paths, numeric clusters, batteries, manufacturerName, productId.

pipeline.name: fix_all_driver_assets
pipeline.purpose: Generate/ensure driver images (75x75 small.png, 500x500 large.png) in drivers/*/assets/.
